title: Bletchley Park Gathers Minds for Global AI Summit with Elon Musk and Sam Altman
description: Now at the forefront of a different kind of warfare—the battle for AI safety—Bletchley Park, renowned for its role in World War II codebreaking, has become the epicenter of global discussions on the challenges and opportunities in artificial intelligence. Elon Musk, alongside other luminaries like OpenAI’s Sam Altman and Google DeepMind’s Demis Hassabis, converges at ... Read more

title: Celebrating 15 Years of Bitcoin White Paper: The Enduring Legacy of Satoshi Nakamoto
description: Bitcoin celebrates the 15th anniversary of its white paper, which introduced a decentralized digital currency system. The white paper’s concepts, like peer-to-peer transactions and proof-of-work, have led to significant technological and financial developments. In a notable moment for financial technology, Bitcoin’s foundational white paper has reached its 15-year milestone. Authored by the enigmatic Satoshi Nakamoto, [...]
